accuracy.description: The correctness of the final answer provided by the agent.

completeness.description: Whether the answer covers all aspects of the question posed.

reasoning_traceability.description: The ability to follow and understand the logic and steps taken by the agent to reach the answer.

efficiency.description: How effectively the agent uses resources and time to achieve the answer.

robustness.description: The agent's ability to handle a wide variety of questions without failure.

explanation_quality.description: The clarity and comprehensiveness of the explanations provided by the agent for its reasoning.

step_success_rate.description: The proportion of successfully completed steps to the total number of necessary steps to reach the solution.

novelty.description: The extent to which the agent's solution approach is unique and not derived from pre-existing answers.

resilience_to_data_contamination.description: The agent's ability to provide accurate answers without being influenced by incorrect or misleading data.
